thread.title: LEGO Marvel's Avengers covers Thor: The Dark World, Captain America and Iron Man 3 - Gaming
thread.title_full: LEGO Marvel's Avengers covers Thor: The Dark World, Captain America and Iron Man 3 - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Liam Martin
title: LEGO Marvel's Avengers covers Thor: The Dark World, Captain America and Iron Man 3 - Gaming
text: LEGO Marvel's Avengers covers more material than we first thought.The upcoming LEGO release features characters and storylines from The Avengers and its sequel Age of Ultron. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4551550692001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14551550692001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4551550692001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4551550692001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14551550692001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4551550692001.init(); ai_type="video"; } However, it also covers Captain America: The First Avenger, Captain America: The Winter Soldier, Iron Man 3 and Thor: The Dark World."We want to make sure that LEGO Marvel's Avengers is a video game that appeals to anyone who has the slightest attraction to Marvel and their amazing characters, so we've made sure that our roster is second to none," reads a PlayStation blog post. "We're including all of the characters from both Avengers and Avengers: Age of Ultron, of course, and then delving into the comic books for our fun free play. "Players will be able to enjoy the main story, explore our reimagination of LEGO Manhattan, experience places like Asgaard, Washington DC, Malibu, Barton Farm, and much more." Â© Warner Bros. LEGO Marvel's Avengers is in development for Xbox One, Xbox 360, PS4, PS3, PS Vita, Wii U, 3DS and PC.Players assume the roles of earth's mightiest heroes in their quest to save the world, while reliving some of the key moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe, including the Battle of New York between the Avengers and supervillain Loki.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
